This is attained when a member shows a continuous attitude of kindness towards others unselfishly, and a willingness to help those in need. It can also be awarded to members that have shown great enthusiasm and a winning attitude, and for the ability to follow all orders set out by the guild Leader and its Officers and doing so without dispute.This medal may also be achieved by attending a large percentage of guild meetings, functions and special events.
Good Conduct Medal
